name: Dig'n'Draw
description:
Developed this solo for Global Game Jam's Cultural Heritage Jam.

Out on an archaeological dig, you need to use your tools to uncover the ruins of an old saxon village. 

As you uncover ruins, you can begin drawing a map of the village. Look at the artefacts you find around them to identify what they were used for, then label them on your map. Once you draw all of the buildings in the correct location and put the right labels on them, you win :)

Be careful while you dig! A direct hit with most tools will smash any artefacts in the way. Your tools also wear out after a lot of use, so make sure to visit the camp now and then to repair them.
